description: NASA astronauts will conduct two spacewalks in January outside the International Space Station. Tasks include preparing for the roll-out of solar array installation, replacing cameras, and relocating fluid system jumpers. The spacewalks, part of Expedition 74, are critical for station maintenance, upgrades, and future operations, with the first spacewalk marking Cardman’s debut and Fincke’s tenth.
title: NASA to Preview Upcoming ISS Spacewalks Focused on Solar Array Upgrades in January 2026

description: The Arctic is warming faster than anywhere on Earth, and new research reveals why. Using aircraft and ground measurements, scientists found that openings in sea ice boost cloud formation while pollution from oil fields alters Arctic chemistry. Together, these processes form powerful feedback loops that trap heat and speed ice loss. The findings highlight how local Arctic changes can ripple outward, shaping global climate and weather far beyond the polar regions.
title: New Study Explains Why Earth’s Poles Are Heating Up at an Alarming Rate

description: A Legacy of Mettle: The Bharat Benz Story is a heartwarming short documentary that explores the bond between machine and human. Watch now.
title: A Legacy of Mettle: The Bharat Benz Story Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch it Online

description: Kumki 2 is a Tamil adventure drama directed by Prabhu Solomon. The film follows Bhoomi, who rescues and raises a baby elephant that later disappears into the forest. Years later, he sets out on a heartfelt and challenging mission to reunite with his lost companion, uncovering love, loyalty, and courage along the way.
title: Kumki 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Tamil Movie Online?

description: Members Only: Palm Beach Season 1 is an American TV reality show that explores the significance of influence in the elite society as 5 women navigate their lives.
title: Members Only: Palm Beach Season 1 Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know About This Show

description: The Demon Hunter brings together fantasy, romance, and supernatural action in a Chinese mythological world. Following a husband’s emotional journey against dark forces to protect his wife, the film blends cultural roots with intense drama and sword-fighting action.
title: The Demon Hunter OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Eko is a suspense-packed Malayalam thriller set in a mysterious hill station where long-hidden secrets slowly come to light. With strong performances, atmospheric visuals, and a gripping storyline, the film keeps you guessing throughout. After its theatrical release, Eko is now streaming on OTT, making its mystery accessible to wider audiences. This story is shot in a mountainous village and has lots of scenic views too.
title: Eko OTT Release Date Update: Know Everything This Gripping Malayalam Mystery Thriller

description: Here are some of the best gaming smartphones launched in 2025 in India. The list includes iQOO 15, OnePlus 15, Realme GT 8 Pro, Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G, Vivo V60e and Oppo K13 Turbo Pro. Customers outside India can pick models like Asus ROG Phone 9 Pro, RedMagic 11 Pro+, and Honor GT Pro.
title: Best Gaming Smartphones Launched in 2025: iQOO 15, OnePlus 15, Asus ROG Phone 9 Pro, More

description: DIGIPIN was introduced in India by the government in May this year for the simplification of location mapping, enhancing logistics and emergency response. The new digital platform, introduced in alignment with the National Geospatial Policy 2022, is said to ensure last-mile delivery, especially in rural areas. From information about DIGIPIN to a step-by-step guide on the process of obtaining it, here's all you need to know.
title: DIGIPIN Explained: What It Is, Benefits and How to Find Yours

description: HDFC Bank is a Mumbai-based private sector bank that offers multiple financial services, including savings deposits and locker storage. The financial institution also allows its customers to check their account statements online via internet banking, mobile banking, and SMS and missed call banking. However, the account statements are sent to customers' registered email ID as a password-protected file, which offers greater privacy and security.
title: HDFC Bank Statement Password: What is it, How to Open Statement PDF, and More

description: Major hotel groups have had a longstanding rivalry with online travel agencies (OTAs) over customer bookings, but a new competitor has now entered the arena. With more and more companies offering agentic artificial intelligence (AI) tools that can book a hotel online, hoteliers are reportedly intensifying efforts to win over customers.
title: Hotels Shift Focus to Loyalty Programmes to Challenge AI Agents, Booking Platforms: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series launch could be just a few weeks away. We saw plenty of rumours about the three devices in the lineup. Most recently, we got leaked live images of the Samsung Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26 Ultra. The Galaxy S26 Ultra has a quad-camera setup, but the layout is different compared to the Galaxy S25 Ultra. The Galaxy S26 has a triple rear camera unit arranged vertically.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Ultra Design Spotted in Leaked Hands-On Images

description: Gaming-focused TWS earbuds under Rs. 2,000 in India now offer low latency, solid sound, and long battery life at budget prices. This list highlights five options that balance gaming performance and everyday use. The Boat Immortal 121 focuses on ultra-low latency, GoBoult Mustang Torq and Astra emphasise battery life and customisation, Realme Buds T200 Lite deliver strong bass and fast charging, and OnePlus Nord Buds 3r add premium features like 3D Audio and a gaming mode.
title: Top 5 Gaming TWS Under Rs 2,000 in India: Realme Buds T200 Lite, GoBoult Astra and More

description: Moto X70 Air Pro has been officially teased, confirming plans to launch a more advanced version of its slim smartphone. The teaser highlights a stronger focus on AI features and hints at a triple rear camera with a periscope telephoto lens. Regulatory listings suggest support for up to 90W fast charging, an upgrade over the Moto X70 Air. The phone may debut in January and is expected to launch globally as the Motorola Edge 70 Pro, possibly powered by the Snapdragon 7+ Gen 5 chipset.
title: Moto X70 Air Pro to Launch in China Soon; Could Feature Periscope Telephoto Camera, Snapdragon Chipset

description: AI Impact Summit 2026, India’s inaugural artificial intelligence (AI) event, will be held between February 16 and 20 in New Delhi. Ahead of the event, the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) shared the vision, thematic structure, and progress of the summit. During the briefing, it was revealed that the AI summit will focus on democratising AI infrastructure to prevent the risk of the technology being controlled by a small set of companies.
title: AI Impact Summit 2026: MeitY Says AI Should Not Be Controlled by Small Set of Companies

description: The iQOO 15 was launched in China in October as the successor to the iQOO 13. The company is rumoured to be developing another model that will sit above the aforementioned phone in the flagship lineup. As per a tipster, the purported handset could be introduced with the iQOO 15 Ultra moniker and its launch timeline has also been tipped. It is said to pack several upgrades over the existing model for enhanced gaming.
title: iQOO 15 Ultra Key Specifications, Launch Timeline Tipped; May Feature Active Cooling Fan

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra will offer various camera improvements over its predecessor, a tipster claims. The handset is said to deliver reduced camera glare, which is usually found to be troublesome during outdoor photography, owing to a new coating technology. Moreover, it is tipped to ship with “enhanced” camera lenses. The South Korea-based tech giant is expected to launch the Galaxy S26 series in February 2026, which might include the standard Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, and the flagship Galaxy S26 Ultra. However, the company has yet to confirm the launch of the handsets.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra to Launch With Camera Improvements Including Upgraded Lenses, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung to reportedly demonstrate Brain Health feature to detect early signs of dementia at CES 2026. The feature will reportedly analyse users’ voice and sleep patterns through data collected from smartphones and wearables. Samsung is said to be partnering with medical institutions for the clinical validation of this  Brain Health functionality. It reportedly alerts guardians when abnormalities are detected.
title: CES 2026: Samsung Reportedly Plans to Unveil Brain Health Service to Detect Early Signs of Dementia

description: Now available on SainaPlay, Innocent is a quiet Malayalam drama directed by Satheesh Thanvi. With realistic performances and a grounded story, the film holds an IMDb rating of 6.0/10 and appeals to fans of meaningful cinema.
title: Innocent (2025) Now Available For Streaming Online: What You Need to Know About This Malayalam Film

description: LG has announced that it will debut the LG Gallery TV at CES 2026, which starts on January 6. Designed as a lifestyle-focused display, the Gallery TV uses a MiniLED 4K panel, a slim flush-mount design, and magnetic frames to blend into home interiors. Available in 55-inch and 65-inch sizes, it features Gallery Mode, developed with museum curators and integrates the LG Gallery+ service, which offers access to over 4,500 artworks, custom AI-generated visuals, and background music.
title: LG Gallery TV With Magnetic Frames, MiniLED Panel and Gallery+ Service Announced Ahead of CES 2026

description: The PS6 and the next-generation Xbox console are in development at Sony and Microsoft, respectively. The next-gen consoles are said to be planned for launch in 2027, but a new report says the rising RAM prices and declining availability could delay the release of the next-generation consoles.
title: PS6, Next-Gen Xbox Launches Could Reportedly be Delayed Due to Rising RAM Costs

description: Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G was launched in select European countries in September. The Chinese tech firm recently announced that it will launch the new tablet in India on January 6, 2026. The debut of the Pad 2 Pro 5G in India is a few days away, and the company has updated its dedicated microsite to reveal various specifications and features about the upcoming tablet. It will be powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 chipset, paired with a 12,000mAh battery.
title: Redmi Pad 2 Pro 5G Price Range, Chipset Revealed Ahead of India Launch on January 6

description: iQOO Z11 Turbo, which is confirmed to launch in China in January 2026, will be available for purchase in four distinct colourways, the company confirmed via a social media post. Currently available for pre-order in the country via the Vivo China online store, the phone is confirmed to be priced between CNY 2,500 (roughly Rs. 32,000) and CNY 3,000 (about Rs. 38,000). It will be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC. The handset will carry a dual rear camera setup, housed inside a sqaure-shaped module.
title: iQOO Z11 Turbo Confirmed to Launch in Four Colourways in China

description: MeitY issued a statutory advisory reminding all intermediaries of the mandatory due diligence under the IT Act, 2000, and the IT Rules, 2021, amendment. The ministry reiterated a strict 24-hour takedown requirement for content depicting identifiable individuals in sexual acts or impersonations, including digitally altered or AI-generated material. The advisory calls for immediate internal compliance reviews.
title: MeitY Issues Compliance Reminder to Online Platforms Over Obscene Content

description: The Office of the Principal Scientific Adviser (PSA) to the Government of India has published a white paper titled “Democratising Access to AI Infrastructure,” outlining key aspects of expanding access to artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure across the country. The PSA states that the document was prepared with input and feedback from domain experts, stakeholders, and colleagues, and was released on Monday.
title: Government Shares Vision on Making AI Infrastructure in India More Accessible

description: Starring Vikranth in the lead role, LBW: Love Beyond Wicket is an upcoming Tamil drama web series that explores themes of second chances, redemption, and cricket.
title: LBW: Love Beyond Wicket OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Tamil Sports Drama Online

description: Mappls, the homegrown digital mapping and navigation app by MapMyIndia, is expanding its capabilities with the addition of multimodal public transport routes. According to the company’s announcement on Tuesday, users will be able to access metro, rail, and bus route information directly within the app. Its addition is believed to further strengthen Mappls’ position as a comprehensive and multimodal mobility platform.
title: Mappls App Introduces Multimodal Public Transport Routes With Bus, Metro, and Rail Route Information

description: Oppo Find X9s is said to come with a 6.3-inch flat display. It is said to feature two 200-megapixel rear camera sensors and wireless charging support. The battery capacity could be more than 7,000mAh. It is said to feature a 3D ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. The Oppo Find X9s could go official next year alongside the Oppo Find X9 Ultra.
title: Oppo Find X9s Tipped to Launch With 6.3-Inch Display, Two 200-Megapixel Rear Cameras

description: Poco M8 5G confirmed to launch in India on January 8. It will debut with a 50-megapixel AI camera system. The new phone will go on sale via Flipkart. Its design was recently teased through Flipkart listings and promotional videos. It has a squircle-shaped camera module housing two camera sensors and an LED flash.
title: Poco M8 5G India Launch Date Announced: Expected Specifications, Features

description: WhatsApp has announced New Year 2026 features as it prepares for its busiest day of the year, when message and call volumes are claimed to exceed its daily average of over 100 billion messages and 2 billion calls. The update includes a 2026 sticker pack, new video call effects like fireworks and confetti, animated confetti reactions, and animated stickers for Status updates. WhatsApp also highlighted group chat tools such as events, polls, live location sharing, and voice or video notes to help users plan New Year celebrations.
title: WhatsApp Launches New Year 2026 Features With New Stickers, Video Call Effects and Status Tools

description: CD Projekt has sold the popular DRM-free games storefront GOG it its co-founder, Michał Kiciński. Kiciński has acquired 100 percent of the shares of the platform for $25.2 million. CD Projekt said GOG would continue to operate independently under the new ownership and distribute DRM-free games.
title: CD Projekt Sells DRM-Free PC Games Storefront GOG to Its Co-Founder for $25.2 Million

description: LG is reportedly set to refresh its OLED TV lineup for 2026 with two flagship models, the OLED G6 and OLED W6, ahead of CES 2026. Leaks suggest both TVs will use a new Hyper Radiant tandem OLED panel with Brightness Booster Ultra, delivering up to 3.9 times higher brightness than LG’s B-series. The G6 is tipped to offer sizes up to 97 inches and advanced gaming features, while the ultra-slim W6 adds a Zero Connect Box and launches in 77-inch and 83-inch variants.
title: LG OLED G6, LG OLED W6 Leak Hints at Notable Brightness, Gaming Upgrades Arriving in 2026

description: The Oppo Find N6 is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Find N5. While the company has yet to confirm the purported bookstyle-style foldable handset, its specifications have surfaced. According to a tipster, the Oppo Find N6 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It is said to sport a 2K LTPO main screen and a 6.62-inch cover display. The bookstyle-style foldable may come with a triple rear camera setup, headlined by a 200-megapixel sensor.
title: Oppo Find N6 Launch Timeline and Key Specifications Tipped; May Feature Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip

description: The Xiaomi 17 series currently comprises four models, namely, the Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, Xiaomi 17 Pro Max, and Xiaomi 17 Ultra. However, a tipster has shared that the lineup is set to get a new addition in the first half of 2026, as the Chinese smartphone maker is currently testing a phone, which could be part of the flagship series. It is expected to be powered by Qualcomm's flagship octa core 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. This comes soon after the company launched the Xiaomi 17 Ultra.
title: Xiaomi 17 Series to Be Expanded With Fifth Model Featuring Snapdragon Chipset, Tipster Claims

description: Amazon India has announced the Get Fit Days 2026 sale, which begins on January 1 and focuses on fitness, sports, and active lifestyle products. The event features deals on wearables, smartwatches, home workout equipment, and accessories, targeting customers setting new health goals for the year. Highlights include the Whoop One at Rs. 20,990, Lifelong Walking Pad Treadmill at Rs. 10,999, Tego Stance Yoga Mat at Rs. 3,309, and smartwatch offers like the Fastrack Limitless X2 and OnePlus Watch 2.
title: Amazon Get Fit Days Sale 2026 Announced in India: Check Out Some of the Best Deals

description: Realme Neo 8 Infinite Edition will be launched in China in January 2026, a tipster claimed in a social media post. If this is true, then the handset could be unveiled in the country alongside the standard Realme Neo 8. The leaker also shared an image of the retail box of the handset. The phone is said to be equipped with a custom Samsung M14 AMOLED display, which could deliver enhanced clarity and eye protection. More details about the phone are expected to be revealed in the coming days.
title: Realme Neo 8 Infinite Edition Launch Timeline, Retail Box Leaked: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Samsung has silently introduced the Exynos Modem 5410. This 5G chip is expected to power select Galaxy S26 models alongside the upcoming Exynos 2600 processor. The standout feature of this new modem is its support for LTE Direct-to-Cell (DTC) satellite technology, enabling voice and video calls in remote areas. This would enable improved satellite calling features in the Galaxy S26 series.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Could Support Satellite Voice, Video Calls With Samsung's New Exynos Modem 5410

description: The OnePlus Turbo 6 series is confirmed to be launched in China soon, comprising the Turbo 6 and Turbo 6V models. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the company has announced details about the battery capacities of the upcoming smartphones. Both of the upcoming handsets are confirmed to pack 9,000mAh batteries. As per the company, the OnePlus Turbo 6’s battery can deliver more than 10 hours of usage on a single charge.
title: OnePlus Turbo 6, OnePlus Turbo 6V Battery Capacities Revealed Ahead of China Launch

description: Linking your PAN card with your Aadhaar before December 31 is mandatory to keep your PAN operative for tax filing and financial transactions. You can do it online via the e-filing portal, by SMS, or through PAN service centres. Match key details before submission and know what happens if you miss the deadline and answers to common queries.
title: PAN-Aadhaar Deadline: How to Link PAN Card and Aadhaar Card Before December 31

description: Vivo X300 Ultra is expected to be launched early next year as the top-of-the-line variant in the flagship X300 series. Ahead of its anticipated debut, key details about the purported handset have surfaced. According to a tipster, it will be equipped with a 6.82-inch display sourced from BOE. The Vivo X300 Ultra is said to have a similar camera deco as its predecessor, although it could miss out on the dedicated camera button.
title: Vivo X300 Ultra Display, Design Details Tipped Ahead of Launch; to Miss Out on Camera Button
